name: Daenerys Targaryen
quote: I am Daenerys Stormborn, of House Targaryen, of the blood of Old Valyria – I am the Dragon’s Daughter. And I swear to you, that those who would harm you will die screaming.

name: Jon Snow
quote: They were born on the wrong side of the Wall — doesn’t make them monsters.

name: Arya Stark
quote: I am a wolf and will not be afraid.

name: Sansa Stark
quote: I’m sure cutting off heads is very satisfying, but that’s not the way you get people to work together.

name: Ned Stark
quote: The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.

name: Khal Drogo
quote: A Khal does not need a chair to sit upon. He only needs a horse.

name: Robb Stark
quote: How can I call myself King If I can't hold my own castle?

name: Cersei Lannister
quote: When You Play The Game Of Thrones, You Win Or You Die.

name: Tyrion Lannister
quote: I drink and I know things

name: Ramsay Bolton
quote: If you think this has a happy ending, you haven't been paying attention.
